bug.author: myungjoo
bug.description:
Instead of tizen-api, codegen-testcode is included. Exclude test/codegen. Include tizen-api/src <denchmark-link:http://nnsuite.mooo.com/nnstreamer/ci/gcov_html/index.html>http://nnsuite.mooo.com/nnstreamer/ci/gcov_html/index.html</denchmark-link>
This does not seem to be a bug from TAOS-CI itself. Probably, there is a bug in tests/unittestcoverage.py

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1333>#1333</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
This is because of invalid source path for tizen-api. I will update new PR to resolve this issue.
Now coverage report includes tizen c-api.
